features: ULTRA-GENTLE FORMULA: Soothes and protects sensitive skin, preventing razor burn, irritation, and redness
MOISTURIZING: Leaves skin feeling soft, hydrated, and comfortable
NON-LATHERING: Provides a smooth, controlled glide, reducing the risk of nicks and cuts
DERMATOLOGIST-TESTED: Clinically proven to be safe and effective for sensitive skin
FREE OF HARSH CHEMICALS: No fragrances, dyes, parabens, or sulfates to irritate the skin
body.description: Experience the ultimate shaving comfort with Vanicream Shave Cream, a specially formulated non-lathering cream that provides a smooth, close shave without irritating sensitive skin. This glides effortlessly over the skin, creating a protective barrier that minimizes friction and prevents razor burn, nicks, and cuts.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars very good for sensitive skin
reviews.reviewText: There are some more expensive shave creams for sensitive skin and some that are much more expensive but this works well. I tried this when my skin became irritated and I switched to a popular shave cream when my Vanicream ran out. After a week I went back to this.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 24, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I bought this for my daughter who has contact dermatitis. This brand is the only brand I have found that doesn't make her itch. I highly recommend anything by vanicream.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 17, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Finally a creme that doesn't eritate my skin. Prescribed by my dermatologist l, and work like a charm.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars great protuct with a sooting aroma
reviews.reviewText: if you have sensative shin this is the best product to shave with

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great for sensitive skin
reviews.reviewText: I’m allergic to so many things that my allergist have me a list of “safe brands.” I’ve been using Vanicream ever since. It works well and does not cause itching. Highly recommend. Just wish it wasn’t so expensive.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 10, 2023
reviews.reviewText: My skin is dry and this helps a lot. Better shave than Cremo, too.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 30, 2018
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars You blessed my life with this product!
reviews.reviewText: I have a lot of sensitivities to scents, fragrances, chemicals etc. I cannot even use hand lotion because it makes me break out in a rash so painful that my skin cracks open. I was having a very hard time finding anything to shave with... and was forced to simply not shave and cover up. THEN I found Vanicream's Shave Cream. Does is smell like perfume? NO! Does it make me itch or have a rash of any kind? NO! Does it keep my skin from getting cut while shaving? YES! Do I have allergies, hay fever, migraines, or any other allergy symptom after using it? NO! So this product is made for people like me who desperately need something hypoallergenic and fragrance free. Thank you Vanicream for blessing my life with such a wonderful product - you truly have because I can now wear dresses, tank tops, skirts, and shorts again!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 17, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Sorta works for sensitive skin
reviews.reviewText: Bought this at the recommendation of my dermatologists because of redness on my face. He thought my skin was too sensitive to the gel shaving cream I was using.I've been using it for about two weeks. The odor is not pleasant, it's so-so, I'm not impressed with how it spreads on my face for shaving.I shave during my daily shower so my beard / stubble is soft. The texture is smooth but it doesn't seem to provide much lubrications between the razor and my face. I've tried to use greater amounts for shaving but again it doesn't spread very well.The redness on my face has not greatly diminished but I'll continue to use this Vanicream since I have two tubes of it and I'll need to let my Dermatologist know after a month or so if my redness has gone away.Right now I'm only so-so about this product.
